column1: A list of White persons residing on the estate called the Mountain situated in princes
Quarter being 2/3 parts of No. 26 also the Slaves belonging to said Estate the property of the Heirs
of Richard Rogers dead. this 12th. Decemr. 1799.

column10: The November of Slaves belonging to the Mountain Estate the property of the Heirs of
Richard Rogers. Amounts to 49 that is to say Men women & Children_ Decmr 12th 1799
